rWishart
  • @ bearstatistics.com
  • Reference

Nonsingular Wishart Helper Function

Nonsingular Wishart Helper Function

NonsingularWishart(df, Sigma, covariance = FALSE)

Arguments

df
degrees of freedom
Sigma
Covariance matrix
covariance
should covariance matrix be generated (X / df)

Value

list or array of random wishart matrices

Examples

NonsingularWishart(20, diag(1,5))
#>           [,1]       [,2]      [,3]      [,4]       [,5]
#> [1,] 21.647018  2.7918198 -6.000800 -2.523869 -7.1136878
#> [2,]  2.791820 10.7008502 -1.180177  0.390330 -0.1539626
#> [3,] -6.000800 -1.1801772 19.023804 -2.014090 -3.5254185
#> [4,] -2.523869  0.3903300 -2.014090 19.005544  4.9197783
#> [5,] -7.113688 -0.1539626 -3.525418  4.919778 17.4912123
#> attr(,"df")
#> ~20
#> <environment: namespace:rWishart>
